name: The Detour
description:
You thought a little detour would be a great idea. You didn't think that the forest would be overcrowded with rampant elks, swines and cows.

How will you ever get out of there with the car intact?

CONTROLS : Left and right. ESCAPE to quit, F5 to restart.

The Detour was created in an hour as a part of a challenge.

*This is the official page for this title. Anywhere else where this title appears to be available is unofficial and I cannot guarantee that it is safe to download*.
